About.paragraph: â€‹The purpose of Insight Intellect is to support better business decision making. It provides interactive visualizations with self-service business intelligence capabilities, where end users can create reports and dashboards by themselves, without having to depend on information technology staff or database administrators.
Why: We centralize and enrich our clients data
We secure and protect information irrespective of the size of the requirements.
We provide easy interpretation and insights into the clients data
